get.summary: Get all Users for given Organization ID

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Filter by active status: Specify 'true' to retrieve only active users, 'false' to retrieve only inactive users, or 'none' to ignore the active status of users. If 'filterText' is provided, and 'active' is not explicitly specified, the default behavior is to return only active users.
